name: Wargaming Game Center
description: Works perfectly on Linux Mint 19.3. Make sure to install latest driver, Vulkan API (reboot after installation!) and other dependencies before installing Game Center. https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/Installing-drivers
notes:
When you install this launcher be sure to install it with dx11.

When the Launcher opens you need to end the WGC.exe process so that the install will finish.

I advise not running this under proton, because proton is a bit funky with multiple windows.
content:
files:
- wgcinstaller:
    filename: Wargaming_Game_Center_Install_Asia.exe
    url: http://redirect.wargaming.net/WGC/Wargaming_Game_Center_Install_Asia.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Wargaming.net/GameCenter/wgc.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Wargaming Launcher
    executable: wgcinstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    description: Setting Wine to Windows 7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  disable_runtime: false
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  DXVK: true
